The jury submitted the report to Union Minister Ashwini Vaishnaw. The announcement took place at the National Media Centre in New Delhi. Several films won awards across various categories. These include feature films in Telugu, Tamil, Punjabi, and other languages. Awards were also given for action direction, choreography, music, and more.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/news/71st-national-film-awards-complete-winners-list-shah-rukh-khan-vikrant-massey-share-best-actor-katthal-wins-best-hindi-film-vash-is-best-gujarati-film/articleshow/123044344.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/news/71st-national-film-awards-complete-winners-list-shah-rukh-khan-vikrant-massey-share-best-actor-katthal-wins-best-hindi-film-vash-is-best-gujarati-film/articleshow/123044344.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 18:40:20 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI ENTERTAINMENT DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="38780" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123045249,imgsize-38780.cms"/></item><item><title>'Feel like slapping them': Telangana CM's shock remark about young scribes</title><description><![CDATA[Telangana's Chief Minister, A Revanth Reddy, is facing backlash after criticizing young journalists for lacking respect and etiquette at an event. His remarks sparked outrage, with press associations demanding clarification. Simultaneously, Reddy criticized political parties for owning media outlets and addressed concerns about social media misinformation.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/i-sometimes-feel-like-slapping-them-telangana-cm-slams-young-journalists-says-party-run-media-hurts-journalism/articleshow/123039956.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/i-sometimes-feel-like-slapping-them-telangana-cm-slams-young-journalists-says-party-run-media-hurts-journalism/articleshow/123039956.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 17:46:03 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="519050" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123044084,imgsize-519050.cms"/></item><item><title>'A head of state so volatile': Ex-PM Deve Gowda's scathing attack on Trump</title><description><![CDATA[Former Prime Minister HD Deve Gowda has strongly condemned US President Donald Trump's recent remarks describing India's economy as "dead," calling them baseless and ill-tempered. Gowda praised Prime Minister Narendra Modi for standing firm against US pressure and prioritizing India's national interests. He defended India's economic performance and criticized opposition leaders echoing Trump's sentiments.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/a-head-of-state-so-volatile-ex-pm-deve-gowdas-scathing-attack-on-trump-praises-pm-modis-firm-stand/articleshow/123044376.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/a-head-of-state-so-volatile-ex-pm-deve-gowdas-scathing-attack-on-trump-praises-pm-modis-firm-stand/articleshow/123044376.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 18:09:13 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1156175" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123044484,imgsize-1156175.cms"/></item><item><title>Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang: I use words pain and suffering inside our company a lot, because ...</title><description><![CDATA[Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang emphasizes resilience as a key to success, suggesting that overcoming setbacks and hardships is crucial for personal and corporate growth. He believes that character, forged through 'pain and suffering,' is more important than intelligence in achieving greatness. Huang's philosophy has seemingly contributed to Nvidia's recent milestone of reaching a $4 trillion market valuation.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/nvidia-ceo-jensen-huang-i-use-words-pain-and-suffering-inside-our-company-a-lot-because-/articleshow/123044518.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/nvidia-ceo-jensen-huang-i-use-words-pain-and-suffering-inside-our-company-a-lot-because-/articleshow/123044518.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 18:09:11 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="35554" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123044514,imgsize-35554.cms"/></item><item><title>Close call: Two coaches of Sabarmati Express derail; passengers safe</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/muzaffarpur-sabarmati-jan-sadharan-express-derails-near-bhaupur-station-all-passengers-safe/articleshow/123044872.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/muzaffarpur-sabarmati-jan-sadharan-express-derails-near-bhaupur-station-all-passengers-safe/articleshow/123044872.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 18:36:09 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>ARVIND CHAUHAN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="375171" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123045006,imgsize-375171.cms"/></item><item><title>Stones pelted, bike set ablaze: Clashes erupt in Pune village over social media post</title><description><![CDATA[A social media post ignited violent clashes between two groups in Yavat village, Pune, leading to property damage and a motorcycle being set ablaze. Police deployed teargas to disperse the mob and detained the youth responsible for the controversial post. Authorities have increased security and are urging residents to maintain calm as tensions remain high in the area.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/pune/stones-pelted-motorcycle-set-ablaze-clashes-erupt-in-pune-village-over-social-media-post-police-use-teargas-to-disperse-mob/articleshow/123042259.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/pune/stones-pelted-motorcycle-set-ablaze-clashes-erupt-in-pune-village-over-social-media-post-police-use-teargas-to-disperse-mob/articleshow/123042259.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 16:11:58 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI CITY DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="38816" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123042254,imgsize-38816.cms"/></item><item><title>Karun Nair's ex-coach on fifty: 'Wouldn't have got another chance had he failed'</title><description><![CDATA[Karun Nair's resilient 57, his first international half-century in nine years, helped India recover to 224 in the fifth Test against England after a shaky start. His former coach, Sanath Kumar, highlighted Nair's mental toughness and perseverance after being sidelined despite a prior triple century.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-karun-nairs-ex-coach-on-first-fifty-in-9-years-he-wouldnt-have-got-another-chance-had-he-failed/articleshow/123044812.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-karun-nairs-ex-coach-on-first-fifty-in-9-years-he-wouldnt-have-got-another-chance-had-he-failed/articleshow/123044812.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 18:27:03 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>ARNAB MUKHERJI</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="30560" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123044837,imgsize-30560.cms"/></item><item><title>You run the risk of killing …: Meta chief AI scientist Yann LeCun to Elon Musk</title><description><![CDATA[Meta's Yann LeCun has disagreed with Elon Musk's AI strategy. Musk plans to remove the 'researcher' title at xAI. LeCun believes this move risks innovation. He says research and engineering have distinct roles. Other AI companies like OpenAI and Anthropic also use different titles. LeCun points to historic research labs as examples of successful innovation.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/you-run-the-risk-of-killing-meta-chief-ai-scientist-yann-lecun-to-elon-musk-on-his-engineers-vs-researchers-comment/articleshow/123041146.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/you-run-the-risk-of-killing-meta-chief-ai-scientist-yann-lecun-to-elon-musk-on-his-engineers-vs-researchers-comment/articleshow/123041146.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 16:19:30 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="17544" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123042410,imgsize-17544.cms"/></item><item><title>'Explode like a bomb?': BJP mocks Rahul over EC remark; 'we'll save Constitution'</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/explode-like-a-bomb-bjp-hits-back-at-rahul-gandhis-election-commission-remarks-says-well-save-the-constitution/articleshow/123042456.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/explode-like-a-bomb-bjp-hits-back-at-rahul-gandhis-election-commission-remarks-says-well-save-the-constitution/articleshow/123042456.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 16:44:56 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="120200" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123042987,imgsize-120200.cms"/></item><item><title>July gross GST mop-up at Rs 1.96 lakh crore; rises 7.5% YoY</title><description><![CDATA[India's GST collection witnessed a 7.5% year-on-year increase, reaching Rs 1.96 lakh crore in July 2025, driven by strong domestic revenues and increased imports. Domestic revenue grew by 6.7%, while import taxes rose by 9.5%. Net GST revenue stood at Rs 1.69 lakh crore, reflecting a modest increase, though refunds surged significantly.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/gst-collections-july-gross-mop-up-at-rs-1-96-lakh-crore-rises-7-5-year-on-year/articleshow/123043651.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/gst-collections-july-gross-mop-up-at-rs-1-96-lakh-crore-rises-7-5-year-on-year/articleshow/123043651.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 17:19:11 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="496758" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123043637,imgsize-496758.cms"/></item><item><title>Amid racial attacks, India issues advisory for its citizens in Ireland</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/attacks-on-indians-rise-in-ireland-avoid-deserted-areas-especially-in-odd-hours-says-indian-embassy-after-racist-assault-in-dublin/articleshow/123043502.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/attacks-on-indians-rise-in-ireland-avoid-deserted-areas-especially-in-odd-hours-says-indian-embassy-after-racist-assault-in-dublin/articleshow/123043502.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 17:16:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="112330" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123043586,imgsize-112330.cms"/></item><item><title>Amazon CEO Andy Jassy: Having AI do a lot of the coding for us … allows employees to…</title><description><![CDATA[Amazon CEO Andy Jassy has shifted his stance on AI's impact, now emphasizing its potential to enhance employee roles by automating routine tasks. This contrasts with earlier warnings of job displacement. Jassy highlighted AI's current role in coding, customer service, and business process automation, citing significant time savings.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/amazon-ceo-andy-jassy-who-sent-shockwaves-with-ai-means-fewer-jobs-stance-says-having-ai-do-a-lot-of-the-coding-for-us-allows-employees-to/articleshow/123043841.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/amazon-ceo-andy-jassy-who-sent-shockwaves-with-ai-means-fewer-jobs-stance-says-having-ai-do-a-lot-of-the-coding-for-us-allows-employees-to/articleshow/123043841.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 17:29:43 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="805498" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123043837,imgsize-805498.cms"/></item><item><title>Watch: Akash Deep animated send-off after dismissing Ben Duckett</title><description><![CDATA[Akash Deep's fiery spell halted England's explosive start at The Oval, dismissing Ben Duckett for 43. Duckett and Crawley's rapid 92-run opening stand threatened India before Akash's persistence paid off, inducing a mistimed reverse scoop. Akash's animated send-off underscored the intensity of the breakthrough, marking a personal triumph within the crucial Test match.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/watch-akash-deep-roars-after-dismissing-ben-duckett-animated-send-off-lights-up-the-oval/articleshow/123043755.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/watch-akash-deep-roars-after-dismissing-ben-duckett-animated-send-off-lights-up-the-oval/articleshow/123043755.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 17:31:02 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="84586" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123043819,imgsize-84586.cms"/></item><item><title>Hyundai edges ahead as Tata, Mahindra lock horns for No.3 spot: Vahan data</title><description><![CDATA[Maruti Suzuki continues its dominance in India's car market, maintaining a strong lead in July 2025 with impressive sales figures. He alleges that after Hand was caught lying under oath, her lawyers demanded €3 million, which he refused.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/international-sports/conor-mcgregor-breaks-silence-after-court-loss-claims-nikita-hand-begged-for-secret-3-million-deal/articleshow/123044415.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/international-sports/conor-mcgregor-breaks-silence-after-court-loss-claims-nikita-hand-begged-for-secret-3-million-deal/articleshow/123044415.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 18:03:43 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="26682" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123044365,imgsize-26682.cms"/></item><item><title>'No response, no letters': EC's 5-point attack on Rahul over 'vote theft' claim</title><description><![CDATA[The Election Commission of India (ECI) has strongly refuted Rahul Gandhi's allegations of electoral misconduct, labeling them as "wild" and unsubstantiated. The ECI stated that Gandhi has not engaged with the commission despite repeated attempts at communication. Gandhi accused the ECI of complicity in "vote theft" and working for the BJP, threatening to expose their alleged actions.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/ecs-5-point-attack-on-rahul-gandhi-poll-body-calls-vote-theft-remark-wild-says-he-refused-to-engage/articleshow/123043481.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/ecs-5-point-attack-on-rahul-gandhi-poll-body-calls-vote-theft-remark-wild-says-he-refused-to-engage/articleshow/123043481.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 17:11:08 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1128904" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123043507,imgsize-1128904.cms"/></item><item><title>Connor McDavid turns water baby: poolside moment with wife Lauren — before Draisaitl wedding</title><description><![CDATA[Before Leon Draisaitl's wedding, Connor McDavid's wife, Lauren, shared playful moments on Instagram, revealing a relaxed side of the Oilers' captain. Fans enjoyed seeing McDavid poolside and in a golf cart with Draisaitl and their partners. The social media snapshots highlight the close friendship between the NHL stars and their significant others, showcasing their lives beyond the ice.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nhl/news/connor-mcdavid-turns-water-baby-as-wife-lauren-shares-candid-poolside-snap-ahead-of-leon-draisaitl-and-celeste-desjardins-wedding/articleshow/123042147.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nhl/news/connor-mcdavid-turns-water-baby-as-wife-lauren-shares-candid-poolside-snap-ahead-of-leon-draisaitl-and-celeste-desjardins-wedding/articleshow/123042147.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 17:30:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="101154" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123042845,imgsize-101154.cms"/></item><item><title>Duckett and Crawley make history, become first opening pair to...</title><description><![CDATA[Ben Duckett and Zak Crawley's exceptional opening partnership continues to flourish, setting new records against India in Test cricket. They surpassed Greenidge and Haynes with their eighth 50-plus stand, accumulating the highest runs for an England opening pair against India.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-5th-test-ben-duckett-and-zak-crawley-make-history-become-first-opening-pair-to-achieve-this-feat-vs-india/articleshow/123043217.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-5th-test-ben-duckett-and-zak-crawley-make-history-become-first-opening-pair-to-achieve-this-feat-vs-india/articleshow/123043217.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 17:03:28 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="122282" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123043362,imgsize-122282.cms"/></item><item><title>Trump's 25% tariff: India expects minimal impact; agri, GM food no-go areas in trade talks</title><description><![CDATA[The US imposition of 25% tariffs is expected to have minimal impact on India, with over half of Indian exports remaining unaffected due to existing exemptions. Trade between the two nations reached $131.8 billion in fiscal year 2024-25. India remains firm on not offering duty concessions for agricultural, dairy, and GM products, citing religious sentiments.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/donald-trumps-25-tariff-india-expects-minimal-impact-indicates-agriculture-dairy-gm-food-no-go-areas-in-trade-deal-talks/articleshow/123042641.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/donald-trumps-25-tariff-india-expects-minimal-impact-indicates-agriculture-dairy-gm-food-no-go-areas-in-trade-deal-talks/articleshow/123042641.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 16:47:08 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="65312" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123043030,imgsize-65312.cms"/></item><item><title>Rape case: How Prajwal Revanna reacted in court after conviction</title><description><![CDATA[Prajwal Revanna, grandson of former Prime Minister H.D. Deve Gowda, was convicted Friday in Bengaluru in a rape case involving a domestic help. The special court found him guilty of raping the woman at his farmhouse in 2021, acts allegedly recorded on his phone.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/broke-down-started-weeping-prajwal-revanna-in-tears-after-his-conviction-in-rape-case-quantum-of-punishment-tomorrow/articleshow/123041094.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/broke-down-started-weeping-prajwal-revanna-in-tears-after-his-conviction-in-rape-case-quantum-of-punishment-tomorrow/articleshow/123041094.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 15:35:04 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="28758" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123041162,imgsize-28758.cms"/></item><item><title>Charles wept over Camilla night before marrying Diana, insiders share details</title><description><![CDATA[King Charles and Princess Diana's wedding, though seemingly a fairy tale, was fraught with heartache. Both reportedly cried the night before, Charles due to his lingering love for Camilla, whom he honored with cufflinks, and Diana due to her own reservations. The marriage was further strained by Camilla's continued presence and Diana's struggles, casting a shadow over their union from the start.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/uk/royal-love-triangle-charles-wept-over-camilla-night-before-marrying-diana-insiders-say-wedding-was-doomed-from-day-one/articleshow/123042136.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/uk/royal-love-triangle-charles-wept-over-camilla-night-before-marrying-diana-insiders-say-wedding-was-doomed-from-day-one/articleshow/123042136.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 16:24:37 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="751332" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123042526,imgsize-751332.cms"/></item><item><title>'He's not a child': Rijiju attacks Rahul's 'anti-India' stance</title><description><![CDATA[Parliamentary Affairs Minister Kiren Rijiju criticized Rahul Gandhi for echoing Donald Trump's "dead economy" remarks, deeming it an "anti-India" stance. Rijiju urged Gandhi to act with the dignity expected of an opposition leader, rather than attacking the government. Gandhi had listed reasons for India's economic decline, blaming Modi's policies and alleging favoritism towards Adani.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/dead-economy-remark-kiren-rijijus-not-a-child-jibe-at-rahul-gandhi-calls-out-anti-india-stance/articleshow/123041196.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/dead-economy-remark-kiren-rijijus-not-a-child-jibe-at-rahul-gandhi-calls-out-anti-india-stance/articleshow/123041196.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 15:31:23 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="990299" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123041298,imgsize-990299.cms"/></item><item><title>Pant, Woakes and more - Full list of injuries in the Anderson-Tendulkar Trophy</title><description><![CDATA[The intense India-England Test series has been marred by a string of injuries, impacting both squads significantly. Here's what Bombay HC said</title><description><![CDATA[The Bombay High Court recently ruled that a wife's allegation of impotency against her husband in divorce or maintenance petitions does not constitute defamation. Justice Modak dismissed a man's complaint, emphasizing that such claims are relevant under the Hindu Marriage Act when supporting her case. This decision contrasts with a 2018 Nagpur bench ruling that deemed calling someone "impotent" as defamatory, especially outside legal contexts.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/is-it-defamation-to-call-husband-impotent-in-court-bombay-hc-draws-line-in-marital-disputes-heres-what-it-said/articleshow/123041923.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/is-it-defamation-to-call-husband-impotent-in-court-bombay-hc-draws-line-in-marital-disputes-heres-what-it-said/articleshow/123041923.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 16:07:03 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="891065" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123042149,imgsize-891065.cms"/></item><item><title>No F-35 jets from US for India? Govt mulls next steps after 25% tariff shock</title><description><![CDATA[India is exploring options to address US President Trump's 25 per cent tariff on Indian goods, but immediate retaliation is unlikely. While aiming to maintain trade relations by potentially increasing imports of natural gas, communication equipment, and gold from the US, India has ruled out new defense purchases, including the F-35 fighter jets.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/trade-war-no-f-35-jets-from-us-for-india-govt-mulls-next-steps-after-25-tariff-shock/articleshow/123033075.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/trade-war-no-f-35-jets-from-us-for-india-govt-mulls-next-steps-after-25-tariff-shock/articleshow/123033075.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 08:39:10 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="822876" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123033635,imgsize-822876.cms"/></item><item><title>Nikita Hand sues Conor McGregor over court fallout: Claims manipulation of Irish appeal process</title><description><![CDATA[Nikita Hand has filed a new civil claim against Konor McGregor and two others. The court rejected McGregor's appeal. He must pay damages from the original ruling.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/international-sports/conor-mcgregor-sued-again-as-nikita-hand-accuses-him-of-manipulating-irish-court-in-failed-appeal/articleshow/123042231.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/international-sports/conor-mcgregor-sued-again-as-nikita-hand-accuses-him-of-manipulating-irish-court-in-failed-appeal/articleshow/123042231.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 16:09:15 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="28348" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123042190,imgsize-28348.cms"/></item><item><title>IND vs ENG: Why are players and fans wearing white headbands at The Oval?</title><description><![CDATA[England honored Graham Thorpe on Day 2 of the fifth Test at The Oval, with players and fans wearing white headbands, commemorating his birth anniversary and raising mental health awareness. India resumed at 204/6, with pacers Atkinson and Tongue making early breakthroughs.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-5th-test-why-are-players-and-fans-wearing-white-headbands-at-the-oval/articleshow/123041688.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-5th-test-why-are-players-and-fans-wearing-white-headbands-at-the-oval/articleshow/123041688.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 15:51:45 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="97166" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123041682,imgsize-97166.cms"/></item><item><title>Dalit techie’s murder: Woman's father arrested in Tamil Nadu</title><description><![CDATA[In Tamil Nadu, a sub-inspector named Saravanan has been arrested concerning the alleged honour killing of Kavin Selvaganesh, a 23-year-old Dalit software engineer. Subashini has denied her parents' involvement, stating they planned to reveal the relationship later.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/chennai/dalit-techies-murder-womans-father-arrested-in-tamil-nadu-honour-killing-case-family-accepts-kavins-body-after-5-days-of-protest/articleshow/123036476.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/chennai/dalit-techies-murder-womans-father-arrested-in-tamil-nadu-honour-killing-case-family-accepts-kavins-body-after-5-days-of-protest/articleshow/123036476.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 11:46:37 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI CITY DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="25698" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123036668,imgsize-25698.cms"/></item><item><title>Heroic rescue: 7 Indians in Singapore pull woman from 3ft sinkhole</title><description><![CDATA[Seven Indian migrant workers, hailed as heroes for rescuing a woman from a sinkhole in Singapore, have been invited to meet President Tharman Shanmugaratnam. Investigations are ongoing, with promises of action against all involved parties.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/hubballi/kridl-scam-ex-clerk-with-rs-15000-salary-amassed-assets-worth-rs-30cr/articleshow/123026648.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/hubballi/kridl-scam-ex-clerk-with-rs-15000-salary-amassed-assets-worth-rs-30cr/articleshow/123026648.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 10:43:48 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="69930" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123035144,imgsize-69930.cms"/></item><item><title>10 most powerful earthquakes in the world: Kamchatka Quake joins history’s deadliest list</title><description><![CDATA[The world has witnessed several catastrophic earthquakes, with the 1960 Valdivia, Chile quake topping the list at magnitude 9.5. The recent 8.8 magnitude quake in Kamchatka Peninsula in 2025 has revived discussions about seismic preparedness and disaster response.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/rest-of-world/top-10-most-powerful-earthquakes-in-the-world-kamchatka-quake-joins-historys-deadliest-list/articleshow/123039272.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/rest-of-world/top-10-most-powerful-earthquakes-in-the-world-kamchatka-quake-joins-historys-deadliest-list/articleshow/123039272.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 15:02:47 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="120126" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123040144,imgsize-120126.cms"/></item><item><title>Friendship day: Best messages, quotes, wishes to share </title><description><![CDATA[Friendship Day 2025 is approaching, offering a chance to strengthen bonds with cherished friends. From sharing nostalgic photos to planning themed parties or virtual meetups, the focus remains on appreciating the invaluable role friends play in life's journey.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/events/happy-friendship-day-2025-best-messages-quotes-wishes-greetings-gifs-whatsapp-status-and-images-to-share-on-friendship-day/articleshow/123041197.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/events/happy-friendship-day-2025-best-messages-quotes-wishes-greetings-gifs-whatsapp-status-and-images-to-share-on-friendship-day/articleshow/123041197.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 15:37:05 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI LIFESTYLE DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="50394" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123041222,imgsize-50394.cms"/></item><item><title>13-year-old girl forced to marry 40-year-old man in Andhra</title><description><![CDATA[In Hyderabad, police have filed a case against a 40-year-old man for allegedly marrying a 13-year-old girl. Authorities have booked the groom, the girl's mother, and attendees under the Prohibition of Child Marriage Act.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/hyderabad/40-yr-old-booked-for-marrying-13-yr-old-girl/articleshow/123029056.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/hyderabad/40-yr-old-booked-for-marrying-13-yr-old-girl/articleshow/123029056.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 00:25:58 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>SRINATH VUDALI</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="35484" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123033077,imgsize-35484.cms"/></item><item><title>Trump tariff impact? Reliance Industries and Nayara Energy, with term agreements, may continue imports. This shift could raise costs and impact refining margins, though India can transition to alternative sources.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/donald-trump-tariff-impact-state-run-oil-refiners-stop-russia-crude-oil-purchases-in-spot-market-government-says-no-instructions-given/articleshow/123037780.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/donald-trump-tariff-impact-state-run-oil-refiners-stop-russia-crude-oil-purchases-in-spot-market-government-says-no-instructions-given/articleshow/123037780.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 14:24:18 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="63864" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123039556,imgsize-63864.cms"/></item><item><title>'System is broken': Kamala Harris hints at stepping away from politics</title><description><![CDATA[Former US Vice President Kamala Harris, in a recent interview, revealed her decision to step away from politics, including declining to run for California governor, citing a belief that the political system is "broken." He alleges the EC is working for the BJP to manipulate votes, citing suspicions from past elections in Madhya Pradesh, Lok Sabha, and Maharashtra. Gandhi warned of exposing this alleged misconduct, deeming it treasonous and promising accountability for those involved. ]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/wont-spare-anyone-rahul-gandhi-accuses-ec-of-vote-chori-for-bjp-claims-to-have-open-and-shut-proof/articleshow/123038294.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/wont-spare-anyone-rahul-gandhi-accuses-ec-of-vote-chori-for-bjp-claims-to-have-open-and-shut-proof/articleshow/123038294.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 13:21:06 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="735355" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123038294,imgsize-735355.cms"/></item><item><title>'Not the case': Tharoor on Trump's 'dead economy' jab; counters Rahul again</title><description><![CDATA[Shashi Tharoor contradicted Rahul Gandhi's agreement with Donald Trump's assessment of the Indian economy. Trump had suggested India and Russia could "take their dead economies down together," a statement Rahul Gandhi supported.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/not-the-case-shashi-tharoor-asked-about-trumps-dead-economy-remark-counters-rahuls-stance-once-more/articleshow/123038451.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/not-the-case-shashi-tharoor-asked-about-trumps-dead-economy-remark-counters-rahuls-stance-once-more/articleshow/123038451.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 13:27:37 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="885424" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123038482,imgsize-885424.cms"/></item><item><title>Who will succeed Dhankhar? VP election on September 9</title><description><![CDATA[The Election Commission of India has declared that the election for the Vice President of India is scheduled for September 9, 2025. As per the ECI's released schedule, the deadline for submitting nominations is August 21. The counting of votes will occur on the same day as the election, September 9.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/who-will-replace-jagdeep-dhankhar-vice-presidential-election-on-september-9-all-you-need-to-know/articleshow/123038111.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/who-will-replace-jagdeep-dhankhar-vice-presidential-election-on-september-9-all-you-need-to-know/articleshow/123038111.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 13:00:21 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="168812" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123038344,imgsize-168812.cms"/></item><item><title>'No support in male-dominated society': Divya becomes India’s 4th female GM; but why so few?</title><description><![CDATA[Divya Deshmukh's Grandmaster title highlights a gender disparity in Indian chess. Only four Indian women have achieved this rank, compared to over eighty men. Experts cite societal pressures, lack of support, and financial constraints as key factors. They emphasize the need for inclusive policies, coaching, and financial aid. This will encourage more women to pursue chess professionally.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/chess/chess-no-support-in-male-dominated-society-divya-deshmukh-becomes-indias-4th-female-gm-but-why-arent-there-more/articleshow/123035744.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/chess/chess-no-support-in-male-dominated-society-divya-deshmukh-becomes-indias-4th-female-gm-but-why-arent-there-more/articleshow/123035744.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 11:11:06 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>JYOTIRMOY HALDER</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="102740" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123035827,imgsize-102740.cms"/></item><item><title>IND vs ENG: Lancashire explain why they removed Pakistan jersey fan - it wasn't due to his T-shirt</title><description><![CDATA[Lancashire Cricket Club apologised after a fan wearing a Pakistan jersey was removed from Old Trafford during the India-England Test. The club cited prior tensions between fans, including an incident involving a Pakistan flag, as influencing their decision. They claimed the fan's removal wasn't solely due to the jersey but his behaviour after being asked to cover it.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/lancashire-explain-why-they-removed-fan-wearing-pakistan-jersey-at-old-trafford-it-wasnt-due-to-his-t-shirt/articleshow/123039038.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/lancashire-explain-why-they-removed-fan-wearing-pakistan-jersey-at-old-trafford-it-wasnt-due-to-his-t-shirt/articleshow/123039038.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 13:59:55 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="171542" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123039280,imgsize-171542.cms"/></item><item><title>‘Coerced to bury 100 bodies’: SIT finds 15 bones in Dharmasthala forest pit</title><description><![CDATA[A Special Investigation Team (SIT) in Dharmasthala unearthed partial skeletal remains, suspected to be of a man, from a sixth burial site identified by a complainant alleging mass burials. The remains, found near the Netravathi river, included 15 bones.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/mangaluru/coerced-to-bury-100-bodies-mostly-women-and-minors-sit-finds-15-bones-in-dharmasthala-forest-pit-on-day-3-pan-card-traced-to-man/articleshow/123032630.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/mangaluru/coerced-to-bury-100-bodies-mostly-women-and-minors-sit-finds-15-bones-in-dharmasthala-forest-pit-on-day-3-pan-card-traced-to-man/articleshow/123032630.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 06:59:43 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="106242" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123037044,imgsize-106242.cms"/></item></channel></rss>

      <title><![CDATA[No interim US-India trade deal yet; Indian exporters brace for 20-25% tariffs as August 1 deadline nears]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/world/india-us-trade-deal-delay-trump-tariffs-impact-exporters-19644819.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Indian exporters are gearing up for possible US tariffs of 20–25% as the August 1 deadline set by President Trump approaches without an interim trade deal. While the tariff uncertainty has stalled orders, industry leaders say Indian exporters remain competitively placed compared to rivals like Bangladesh and China. Exporters expect the tariffs to impact profit margins more than supply chains, with fresh orders likely once clarity emerges post-deadline. Trade talks are set to resume in August as both countries work toward a broader agreement.]]></description>

      <description><![CDATA[Nayara Energy has initiated legal action against Microsoft in Delhi High Court, alleging abrupt suspension of its licensed services including Outlook and Teams.
